text: The Democrats (, DEM) is a political party in Brazil. It was founded in 1985. It changed to its current name in 2007. The original name reflected the party's support of free market policies."Liberal Front Party (PFL)". Encyclop√¶dia Britannica Online. The Democrats' identification number is 25 and its colors are green, blue, and white. ==References== Category:Democrats (Brazil) Category:1980s establishments in Brazil Category:1985 establishments
title: Democrats (Brazil)
